pages.text: Pearls are inside oysters and are used by $(turtlemancy)Turtlemancers$() in a lot of recipes.$(br2)There are several ways to obtain a pearl:$(li)$(l:spells/apprentice_spells#instant_pearl)With the Instant Pearl Speel$(li)$(l:turtlemy/basic_turtlemy)With a Turtlemy

pages.title: Obtaining the pearl
pages.text: Any $(turtlemancer) wand can get instantly the pearl of the oyster by right-clicking any Oyster Sand block, but the oyster will be destroyed by the spell.
